metadata.title: CVE-2019-5060 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An exploitable code execution vulnerability exists in the XPM imagerendering function of SDL2_image 2.0.4. A specially crafted XPM image cancause an integer overflow in the colorhash function, allocating too smallof a buffer. This buffer can then be written out of bounds, resulting in aheap overflow, ultimately ending in code execution. An attacker can displaya specially crafted image to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: libsdl2-image package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and needs fixing.
